sentences.sentence: Malcolm, for instance, works in isolation but I have no doubts about his abilities.
sentences.translation: 例如，马尔科姆虽然一个人独立工作，但我丝毫不怀疑他的能力。

sentences.sentence: I would normally suggest taking time off work, but in this instance I'm not sure that would do any good.
sentences.translation: 我通常会建议休假，但就这个情况而言，我不敢保证休假会有什么好处。

sentences.sentence: Can you quote me an instance of when this happened?
sentences.translation: 你能否给我举例说明一下发生这事的情况？
